directions: 1. Combine all ingredients together except for the egg whites.    2. Beat eggs whites until stiff and fold into mixture from previous step.    3. Heat Abelskiver pan. Put a bit of butter in each cup. Add a scoop of batter into each cup, about 1/2 to 2/3 full (it rises). Turn when the bottom gets golden brown with a knitting needle.   4. Finish cooking other side.
note: serve with jam or lemon curd, butter and syrup, and/or sugar to dip.
